casebody.data:
State
v.
Richard Jackson Hall 382P15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Mr. Richard Jackson Hall, for Hall, Richard Jackson. Mr. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, Mr. Garry W. Frank, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of June 2016 by Defendant for Petition for Rehearing of Denial of Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
